body:
Comment 2 by **daveroundy**: 
To expand upon grischenkow's short reply, it seems that the problem is that you're 
compiling for amd64, but you don't have a libpthread for amd64.  The easy solution is 
to set GOARCH=386, which is what is working for me on my lenny Debian box.  Yours is 
older, but probably will work fine once you've configured go properly.

Linux morland 2.6.26-2-686 #1 SMP Wed Nov 4 20:45:37 UTC 2009 i686 GNU/Linux
